summary:
I love solving problems and I especially love it when you get to try new ideas and find creative solutions. In my role I get a unique opportunity to connect with diverse people, exchange ideas and drive real change on topics that impact society around the topics of sustainability, SDGs and climate action.

In my current role I combine my passion for sustainability and climate action and apply this to the publishing industry. In practice this means I get to work on driving real action on climate and the SDGs and even helping to launch the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Childrenâ€™s Book Club and the SDG Publishers Compact.

Previously, I gained my experience in policy communications creating successful campaigns on topics related to data, academic publishing and accessibility, in addition to serving as strategic communication advisor on industry initiatives such as CHORUS, CLOCKKS and the Accessible Books Consortium. 

Outside of work, I am an Aussie expat who loves eating great food and remains totally addicted to coffee. I am a proud mother, a strong advocate for gender equality and inclusion and attempt to live sustainably by #sayingnotoplastic.

If you want to chat about sustainability, SDGs and climate action I would love to get in touch!
